Class SimpleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.applications.mawo.server.common.AbstractTask
      • org.apache.hadoop.applications.mawo.server.common.SimpleTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TeardownTask

    public class SimpleTask
extends AbstractTask
    Define Simple Task. Each Task has only one command
